text:
I don't sell websites or AI tools.
I solve 3 problems for business owners:
Websites that don't convert
Manual processes that waste time
AI that doesn't drive revenue
Which one hurts your business most?
Reply with 1, 2, or 3—I'll share a quick fix.
#BusinessOwner #Solutions #Value

Most businesses think they need a website redesign.
90% of the time, they need 3 things fixed:

1. Slow loading speed
2. Confusing call-to-action
3. Weak mobile experience
Which one is killing your conversions?
#WebPerformance #UX #ConversionRate
